title: Jamie O'Hara left 'heartbroken' as he's blocked from kids | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share 'While he appreciates that she may have had to accommodate her own plans but this was a genuine mistake and he shouldn't be punished for weeks in court. The only person it's hurting is the children.' The source went on to say that Jamie had a whole weekend planned, with theme park tickets, reserved football seats and a hotel. Blocked: Jamie's girlfriend Elizabeth Tierney suggested that she could pick up the children while Jamie drove over, but sources claim Danielle was not happy A representative for Danielle Lloyd has been contacted by MailOnline for comment. Explaining the situation, the source continued: '[Jamie] was at a charity event last night where he left a bag carrying his car keys. It wasn't until the venue had shut that he realised. 'Knowing he was going to be two hours late to collect the kids in Birmingham, Jamie's partner Elizabeth [Tierney] suggested she would collect them for him, because she lives nearby. 'It was at that point that Danielle flew off the handle and told Jamie not to let Elizabeth near the house, that he could no longer see the children and that she'd see him court.' Jamie vented his frustrations at Danielle in an epic Twitter rant on Wednesday afternoon. Telling his story: Jamie raged on Twitter on Wednesday, after being told he couldn't see the children He wrote: 'Ex wife wont let me go and watch my own kids play football and says if I turn up there will be trouble,have to go back to court for access (sic)' 'Drove all the way to Birmingham to be told that access has been stopped and I have to go back to court to see my three boys,' he continued. He verified: 'All because I left my car keys at a charity event last night and had to collect them this morning and wasn't able to get there at 9:30' 'Try and rectify the situation and make the situation work as parents but get told don't bother and now go to court if you want to see them' 'The disgraceful thing is I only want to see my three children and the only ones that get hurt are them, what a disgrace,' Jamie concluded. Out late: Jamie was art at a charity evet for LGBT history on Tuesday night when he left a bag behind carrying his keys Jamie confirmed that he had reignited is romance with Elizabeth last week when they attended a London Fashion Week show together. He reportedly split with Celebrity Big Brother girlfriend Bianca Gascoigne 'to focus on family'. Jamie and Danielle were married between 2012 and 2014, when their two-year union was dissolved in matter of seconds on the grounds of adultery. It followed the revelation that father-of-three Jamie had allegedly cheated with two other women. Meanwhile, Danielle is expecting her first child with fiance Michael O'Neill, who she met in late 2015. This week, Danielle brushed off the drama as she revealed that her baby due date is at the end of August and that her sons are hoping it will be a sister. A rift between Danielle and Jamie was widened during his time in Celebrity Big Brother, last month. He was delighted to be reunited with his sons as soon as he came out, saying there was: 'Nothing better than having [his] boys in my arms.'
